item.title: Mentioned by Medicine Hat News
item.description:
Payne holds firm on marijuana
Both are MPs but there's at least one significant difference, Federal MP Justin Trudeau openly admits to smoking marijuana whereas local MP LaVar Payne informed Talk this week that he doesn't and never has. LaVar holds firm to the widespread belief ...

item.title: Mentioned by Medicine Hat News
item.description:
Payne worries shuffle could slow issue of flood recovery
Medicine Hat MP LaVar Payne is concerned Prime Minister Harper's Monday cabinet shuffle will see some lags on important southeast Alberta files as new Public Safety Minister Stephen Blaney gets himself up to speed on flood recovery efforts.

item.title: Mentioned by Medicine Hat News
item.description:
MP LaVar Payne feels for flood victims, says feds will be there to help when ...
MP LaVar Payne has driven through the flood-ravaged areas of the city and says he feels deeply for those impacted. “It's heartwrenching to see the devastation,” said Payne. “My heart goes out to those personally affected.” He is particularly aware of the strain ...

item.title: Mentioned by Hill Times (subscription)
item.description:
Alberta MPs help constituents clean up after massive, disastrous Calgary flood
Nine Calgary ridings, including Prime Minister Stephen Harper's Calgary Southwest riding as well as Conservative MP LaVar Payne's Medicine Hat riding were evacuated, but non of the riding offices were damaged in the floods. “We were really fortunate ...
